definitions.definition: A strip of fabric worn around the head .
A hair accessory , made of a flexible material and curved like a horseshoe , for holding one's hair back.
A strip of fabric attached to the top of the spine of a book ; used as decoration and reinforcement .
A thin slip of iron on the tympan of a printing press .

main_definition: A strip of fabric worn around the head .
secondary_definitions: A hair accessory , made of a flexible material and curved like a horseshoe , for holding one's hair back.
A strip of fabric attached to the top of the spine of a book ; used as decoration and reinforcement .
( printing ) A thin slip of iron on the tympan of a printing press .
